old

Class OldLanguage

  • java.lang.Object
    • old.OldLanguage

  • public class OldLanguage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the tools for allowing a multi-lingual implementation of this program. It wraps around a ResourceBundle object which can load Strings from saved properties files and provide them to the program's GUI. It can also accept the user properties file, which it uses to both load a user-defined Locale to set the language and to save any changes to the Locale into the file for future re-use.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Craig

      private static class  OldLanguage.LanguageHolder
      Holder class to allow for a thread-safe lazy Singleton instantiation of the Language instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static OldLanguage getInstance()
        Returns a shared instance of this Language module using a thread-safe Singleton instantiation.
        Returns:

      • linkToUserProperties

        public void linkToUserProperties(java.util.Properties userProperties)
        Links this class to the program's user properties file and sets the Locale based on the user-defined setting in that file. Using this method allows for changes to the language setting of the program to be saved and recalled each time the program is run.
        Parameters:
        userProperties - the user properties file to be linked to this class.

      • setLocale

        public void setLocale(java.lang.String language,
                      java.lang.String country)
        Sets the Locale of the ResourceBundle based on a chosen language and country. If a user properties file has been linked to this class, the file is updated with the Locale information.
        Parameters:
        language - the language of the Locale.
        country - the country of the Locale.

      • setLocale

        public void setLocale(java.util.Locale locale)
        Sets the Locale of the ResourceBundle based on a chosen language and country. If a user properties file has been linked to this class, the file is updated with the Locale information.
        Parameters:
        locale - the new Locale to be set.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
        Wrapper method for the getString() method for ResourceBundle, which returns the String from the resource properties file that matches the key parameter.
        Parameters:
        key - the property key of the String to be returned from the resource.
        Returns:
        the String to be returned from the resource.
